mapper.select: SELECT i.`name` AS `stuName`, i.`id` AS `stuId` FROM `basic_user_info` i, (SELECT u.`stu_id`, s.`status` FROM (`edu_lesson_class_stu` u ,`edu_lesson_class_common_homework` h) LEFT JOIN `edu_common_homework_stu_score` s ON u.`stu_id` = s.`stu_id` AND s.`homework_id` = h.`id` WHERE h.`id` = #{homeworkId} AND u.lesson_class_id = h.`lesson_class_id`) t WHERE t.`status` IS NULL AND t.`stu_id` = i.`id`

SELECT i.`name` AS `stuName`, u.`stu_id` AS `stuId`, IFNULL(s.`status`, 2) AS `status`, s.`score` AS `stuScore`, s.`create_time` AS `commitTime` FROM (`edu_lesson_class_stu` u ,`basic_user_info` i,`edu_lesson_class_common_homework` h) LEFT JOIN `edu_common_homework_stu_score` s ON u.`stu_id` = s.`stu_id` AND s.`homework_id` = h.`id` WHERE h.`id` = #{homeworkId} AND u.lesson_class_id = h.`lesson_class_id` AND u.`stu_id` = i.`id`

SELECT s.`stu_id` AS `stuId`, i.`name` AS `stuName`, s.`create_time` AS `commitTime` FROM `edu_common_homework_stu_score` s, `basic_user_info` i WHERE s.`homework_id` = #{homeworkId} AND s.`status` = 0 AND s.`stu_id` = i.`id`

SELECT s.`stu_id` AS `stuId`, i.`name` AS `stuName`, s.`create_time` AS `commitTime`, s.`score` AS `stuScore` FROM `edu_common_homework_stu_score` s, `basic_user_info` i WHERE s.`homework_id` = #{homeworkId} AND s.`status` = 1 AND s.`stu_id` = i.`id`
